description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the sustainment and delivery of Aviation Life Support Equipment and related services in support to Royal Canadian Air Force Operations.
full_summary:
### ALSE - Test Equipment and Altimeters
**Federal Government Tender Opportunity**

#### Request for Proposal (RFP) Solicitation

The Department of National Defence (DND), Director General Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM), is seeking proposals from qualified suppliers to provide sustainment and delivery services for Aviation Life Support Equipment (ALSE)/Search & Rescue – Aerial Delivery (SAR-AD) in-service support (ISS) and Repair and/or Overhaul (R&O) services for Test Equipment and Altimeters.

**Notice Details:**
- Tender Reference: CB-7704-23121180
- Solicitation Number: W8485-23SL03/C
- Tender Status: Expired (Closed to new bids)
- Publication Date: July 28, 2023
- Tender Closing Date: March 19, 2024, 14:00:00 (Expired)
- Expected Contract Start Date: August 31, 2023
- Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2026

**Key Requirements:**

- The Crown is seeking a supplier that can provide services to support the Royal Canadian Air Force's (RCAF) worldwide operations.
- The successful supplier must be able to perform repairs and/or overhauls of Test Equipment and Altimeters.
- The supplier must also be able to provide in-service support services for ALSE/SAR-AD equipment.
- There are specific security requirements associated with this project.
- Bidders are strongly encouraged to transmit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service.

**Submission and Tendering Details:**

- The tender package can be accessed through the Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) Tender Notice Web Portal.
- Submissions can be made in either official language of Canada (English or French).
- The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
- The successful supplier will be required to perform services to the standards outlined in Annex A of the Performance Work Statement.

**Contact Information:**

- Dan Lebel, Contract Officer
- Phone: (000) 000-0000
- Email: dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca

**Additional Information:**

- The Industrial Security Program (ISP) of PWGSC website provides additional information on personnel and organization security screening or security clauses.
- For more information, please refer to the attached tender package. [1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/14319
